committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for a mid-decade census of population in the year 1975 and every 10 years thereafter.

summary.text: Provides for a mid-decade census of population in the year 1975 and every ten years thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for a mid-decade census of population in the year 1975 and every 10 years thereafter.
